Package CustomEvents

Class MutationEvent

java.lang.Object
Event.GenericEvent
CustomEvents.MutationEvent
public class MutationEvent extends GenericEvent
Represents an event where an individual's genetic distribution is changed. The `MutationEvent` class extends the `GenericEvent` class and implements the functionality for handling the mutation of an individual's genetic distribution in the population.
Since:
1.0
See Also:

    • handle

      public Pair<PopulationInterface,EventContainer> handle(PopulationInterface population, EventContainer pec)
      Handles the mutation event by changing the genetic distribution of the individual. Updates the event counter.
      Specified by:
      handle in class GenericEvent
      Parameters:
      population - The population interface affected by the event.
      pec - The pending event container.
      Returns:
